text: Kaunas University of Technology Men's Basketball Team () is a professional basketball team that represents the Kaunas University of Technology, it is based in Kaunas, Lithuania and currently competes in National Basketball League.http://www.nklyga.lt/lt/top/komanda/?team_id=4637281&season;_id=95469#mbt:123-200$t&0=1 == Club achievements == * 2015-2016 season: RKL 1st place == Team roster == == References == Kaunas Category:Kaunas Category:Basketball teams established in 1994 Category:1994 establishments in Lithuania Category:NKL teams
title: KTU Men's Basketball
